casebody.data:
Joanne GRECES and Frank J. Greces, Plaintiffs-Movants,
v.
ENCOMPASS PROPERTY & CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY OF NEW JERSEY, Defendant-Respondent. M-585/586 September Term 2017
080234 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 26, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file an overlength brief (M-585) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-586) is denied.
